summary.para: Contains classes for the DevExpress Dashboard component for Blazor.
Contains options that allow you to configure the Dashboard component’s backend.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxBackendOptions.RequestHttpHeaders

summary.para: Specifies HTTP headers that are sent to the server.

member.value: An object that is a collection of request headers and values.

summary.para: A Dashboard component.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.AllowMaximizeItems

summary.para: Specifies whether users can maximize dashboard items.

member.value: true to allow users to maximize dashboard items; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.DashboardId

summary.para: Specifies the identifier of the dashboard to be opened in the Dashboard component.

member.value: A string that is a dashboard identifier.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.DashboardIdChanged

summary.para: Fires after the dashboard identifier is changed.

member.param: A string that is a new value of the property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.EncodeHtml

summary.para: Specifies whether the DxDashboard’s value and element content are rendered as HTML or if HTML markers are omitted.

member.value: true if the HTML code in the DxDashboard’s value and element content are not executed and converted to text; false if the DxDashboard’s value and element content can contain HTML code.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.Endpoint

summary.para: Specifies the URL the Dashboard component uses to send data requests to a server.

member.value: A string value that specifies the endpoint URL prefix used to send data requests to a server.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.InitialDashboardId

summary.para: Specifies the identifier of the dashboard to be loaded to the DxDashboard before the component is rendered.

member.value: A string value that specifies the dashboard identifier.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.InitialDashboardState

summary.para: Specifies the state of the dashboard to be loaded to the DxDashboard before the component is rendered.

member.value: A string value that specifies the dashboard state in JSON format.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.LimitVisibleDataMode

summary.para: Specifies a data limitation mode that allows you to display a reduced form of visible data.

member.value: A value that specifies the data limitation mode.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.LoadDefaultDashboard

summary.para: Specifies whether the default dashboard should be loaded from dashboard storage.

member.value: true to load the default dashboard from the dashboard storage; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.Nonce

summary.para: Specifies the nonce value.

member.value: A that specifies the nonce value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.ResizeByTimer

summary.para: Specifies whether to redraw the Dashboard component when the size of its container changes.

member.value: true to redraw the Dashboard component when the size of its container changes; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.ShowConfirmationOnBrowserClosing

summary.para: Specifies whether to show a warning in a browser if a user attempts to leave the page with unsaved data.

member.value: true to show a warning; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.UseCardLegacyLayout

summary.para: Specifies whether to enable the legacy card layout used before v17.1.

member.value: true to enable the legacy card layout used before v17.1; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.UseNeutralFilterMode

summary.para: Specifies whether to show all items in the filter elements deselected by default.

member.value: true to activate Neutral Filter Mode; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboard.WorkingMode

summary.para: Specifies the Dashboard component’s working mode.

member.value: A value that specifies the Dashboard component’s working mode.

summary.para: Fires after the working mode is changed.
Contains export settings.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboardExport.AllowExportDashboard

summary.para: Specifies whether a user can export a dashboard.

member.value: true if a user can export a dashboard; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboardExport.AllowExportDashboardItems

summary.para: Specifies whether a user can export dashboard items.

member.value: true if a user can export dashboard items; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.DashboardBlazor.DxDashboardExport.Unregister

summary.para: Specifies whether to unregister the DevExpress.Dashboard.DashboardExportExtension to remove its functionality from the Web Dashboard.

member.value: true to unregister the extension; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Specifies whether a dashboard control uses batch requests or separate requests to load dashboard items’ data.

member.value: An enumeration value that specifies how DxDashboard loads data.

summary.para: Specifies whether a user can create a JSON data source with a new data connection.

summary.para: Specifies whether to add current parameter values to the exported document.

summary.para: Specifies whether to add current parameter values to the exported document.

summary.para: Specifies the resolution (in dpi) used to export a dashboard/dashboard item to an image.

member.value: An integer value that specifies the resolution (in dpi) used when you export a dashboard/dashboard item as an image. The default value is 96.
